page.title: 11West Park Hospital 1
page.content: This fairly large{hospital}was opened in 1924. It caters for adults with a variety of mental, emotional and psychological illness; the patients often having been the survivors of war, disasters, broken homes and victims of crime but also deprivation from the time of conception, bad family atmospheres and social difficulties. Treatments consist of healthy diet, medicines and informal and semi-formal group and occupational therapy; social domestic and community skills are also taught outside the main hospital in rehabilitation units. There is work available for the patients, for which pocket money is paid, including gardening, light industrial therapy and woodwork.
